# 19th Japan Film Professional Awards

The  is the 19th edition of the Japan Film Professional Awards. Films of 2009 which had not already won a major domestic film award were eligible. The ceremony took place on May 15, 2010 at Shin-Bungeiza in Tokyo. In addition to the usual categories, five films were selected for best films of the "Zero era" (Released from 2000 to 2009).
